name: Depths of Helheim
description:
"Depths of Helheim" is a solo Action-RPG Adventure game, based on Norse mythology, explore the Nine Worlds and use your abilities to defend yourself from threats.

You are a viking, living peacefully on Midgard, when your tranquility is disturbed by hideous monsters, try to understand what is happening, even if it means traveling through the Nine Worlds and putting your life in danger.

Features

- Exponential EXP system that gives you "Level Points".

- Talent tree using "Level Points" to unlock passive and active abilities.

- Stats system : deal more damage, increase your chance to deal critical damage or gain more health!

- Monsters drops money and trophy which can be used to enhance your Viking through the Stats Panel.

- Reading Stone to learn Norse History !

- Explore all the Yggdrasil's Realms.
